attributes.comment:
Proposed adoption fee increases are making a hardship on our families. Since fee
increases are already high enough , you should increase to 3 years the time this
legal paperwork will be in effect Adoptions are taking much longer than previously.
More children than ever are in need of loving families. We can have a positive
impact on those less fortunate.

Increasing the fees could prevent some middle class families from being able to
adopt an orphan. This could burden tax payers as the state tries to raise the
children. Without normal homes, they will not be likely to have a normal emotional
development. This creates a lot of costs to the government.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Susan Bonsai
